about_the_game:
Sentenced to death in The Labyrinth for crimes you were not guilty of. The Minotaur's constructed The Labyrinth during the Primordial Age. Once seen as Eres's ultimate prison, something has gone terribly wrong with the structure. As a Survivor you will find terrifying monsters, and harsh experiments. Discover allies or foes who have shared the same fate. Be careful, not all those you will meet will have your best interest at heart.
Unlock a primordial forge where weapons and armor could be useful on your quest. Construct your own farm in town. Craft potions and cook food for supplies. Survive in The Labyrinth long enough to uncover the primordial magics of these forsaken halls and discover what horrors the ancient races intended to be buried – forever.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850

short_description: Delve into the labyrinth and decide your fate! A 2D turn-based RPG with dungeon building aspects. Farm, grow weapons, create new class combinations, and make hard decisions that will have consequences.
